summary: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.
cast: Matthew Macfadyen|Milla Jovovich|Helen George|Christian Oliver|Luke Evans|Ray Stevenson|Til Schweiger|Markus Brandl|Orlando Bloom|Logan Lerman|Dexter Fletcher|Jane Perry|Mads Mikkelsen|Andy Gathergood|Susanne Wolff|Ben Moor|Christoph Waltz|Freddie Fox|Carsten Norgaard|Isaiah Michalski|Horst Kiss|Gudrun Meincke|Victoria Koestler|Yvonne Pajonkowski|Gabriella Wilde|James Corden|Juno Temple|Nina Eichinger|Max Cane|Iain McKee|Gode Benedix|Hannes Wegener|Florian Br√ºckner|Nadine Merkl|Marc Zahn
title: Los tres mosqueteros
